PCD Group (http://pcdgroup.com/) - Portland, Oregon - Full time in-house (and freelance)

Web Application Developer (Software Engineer)

We need a Web Developer to assist in the development and support of full lifecycle web applications. Responsible for a variety of projects ranging from private intranet web applications to large scale, public facing Internet sites; including front-end web development and back-end CGI programming. We specialize in the strategic, creative and technical delivery of websites as well as custom web applications such as CRM, CMS and other web-based business applications.

Amazing team, competitive salary, a strong emphasis on professional development, amazing benefits package and fantastic river view. Our benefits include medical, dental, vision, alternative care, flexible spending accounts, 401(k) plan with employer contribution, sick leave and paid time off. We look forward to hearing from you.

To Apply: https://www.pcdlinktrack.com/jobapp/1?referrer=hn&position=s...

Job Description: http://pcdgroup.com/careers/engineer/
